description: Structured information describing how two anatomical entities (terms) relate to each other.

confidence._instruction: Add the semantic description for the confidence of the relation between the two anatomical entities.

inRelationTo._instruction: Add the anatomical entity that is put in relation to another anatomical entity.

percentalOverlap._instruction: Enter the overlap between the two anatomical entities expressed in percentage.

relationType._instruction: Add the type of relation between the two anatomical entites (semantic description).
